text: Jaba uniharule aphno samana khole, taba aphno rakama tyahim raheko pa'e, juna uniharula'i nai pharka'idi'i'eko thiyo. Bhanna thale he pita ji! Aba hamila'i aru ke cahincha? Hernusa hamro aphno rakama pani pharka'idi'i'eko cha. Hami aphno ghara parivarako lagi khadyan'ya lya'une chaum, ra aphno bha'iko suraksa garnechaum. Ra eka umtabhari khadyanna barhi lya'unechaum. Ra yo lya'una dherai sajilo cha
